column1: starts off with a loose ball on the pads, which is put away past short fine leg for four
back of a length and seams back in to cramp the batsman for room. Hops and fends it to midwicket
banged in short and wide outside off, Paine stays leg-side of the ball. Throws his hands at it and slaps it in the gap at the covers
full, angling away, nipping away outside off past the tramline. Off-side wide
hip-high short ball on off stump, 140ks, the ball comes onto the bat on this hard pitch with a tinge of grass. Rocks back and swats it to the midwicket boundary although not off the middle
good length and seaming away outside off, Wade attempts a big drive and watches the ball beat the outside edge
short, wide, that should've been smashed to the boundary. Instead, Wade reaches out for the ball and slaps it straight to backward point
chest-hunting short ball on middle, Paine rises with it and pats it down
back of a length, 140ks, bounces and hits the bat as opposed to bat hitting ball. Spliced to point
pitched right up on off stump, driven crisply but straight to Mitch Marsh at mid-off
Johnson hits Paine on the helmet with a 141ks lifter. Paine looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, and is late to swivel into a hook. Doesn't look like a nasty blow. Just a glancing blow for Paine
take that, Mitch Johnson. Excellent riposte from Wade. Back of a length and wide outside off, he frees his hands and goes over the top. Carted up and over extra cover
short, wide, plenty of bounce on this Perth pitch too, flashed down to third man off a thick outside edge
Richardson runs in and hits the bat hard too. This doesn't have much to do with the pace and bounce. Wade simply had a loose grip and lost his bat
back of a length and zinging away outside off past the outside edge. Reminds you of the WACA?
good length at 140ks, he jumps across off, gets inside the line and scoops over the keeper's head. Stunning ball-striking
short and cramps the batsman for room, 141ks, chopped to backward point
back of a length and outside off, 142ks, Wade picks it up and smites it in the direction of cow corner
Wade rides the bounce of this back-of-a-length ball outside off and slides a single to third man
full on off stump, 141ks, right in Wade's swinging arc. He presses forward and hits it on the up over the bowler's head
leg-stump full-toss, horrid ball in any format. Picked off to the right of short fine leg. Wade's flying
full and nipping in on middle, poked back to the right of the bowler via a soft leading edge
full and angling into the pads, whipped away past short fine leg for another four
after three boundaries in four balls, Wade is rooted to the crease as he dabs this full offering to midwicket
Wade jumps off the ground and rides this short ball outside off to deep third man
back of a length and outside off, barely 130ks, the batsman has enough time to flat-bat a single to mid-off and hare across to the other end
Paine makes room outside leg and secures a single to mid-on with a push
full and wide outside off, slapped on the up to extra cover
here comes Wade! Down the track and wildly dragged off the inside half to deep midwicket. He's holding nothing back

Belting catch from Mitch Marsh running in from mid-on and diving forward to pouch it inches from the ground. The pace and bounce comes into the spotlight again. Back of a length and bounces up on off stump, cramps Paine for room. He is late onto a pull/hook and only manages to splice a catch. He contrubited 4 out of 44 in the opening stand
full and cuts away outside off, skids off the pitch and beats Wade's attempt to work it away to the leg side
back of a length and angling in on middle, Bailey camps in the crease and blocks back to the bowler
full and angling in, clipped out to midwicket
back of a length, angling in, bounces and forces the batsman to soften his grip and fend it back down the pitch
bouncer on middle and leg, 141ks, sails over the ducking batsman. Wide called for height - tight call?
back of a length and hits the bat hard, spliced to cover
another one that hits the splice of the bat. Richardson explores the middle of the pitch and keeps Bailey to a single to mid-off
re-set the radar, Richardson. Flings it down the leg side for a wide
turned off the hips through square leg
back of a length and drifting outside leg, tickled off the glove to fine leg
chopped away to the left of backward point for a single
straightens past the outside edge. Back of length, angling in and moves away past the waft
Bailey goes over the top. Full on off stump, he gets one in his hitting radar. stretches out and hoists it over the top of mid-on for four
just short of a good length on off stump, Bailey stands tall and flat-bats it to long-on
glanced off the hips to square leg
short-armed off the hips to fine leg for one
pitched up on off stump, slower offcutter, which is stabbed back to Bresnan
length ball on off stump, Bailey lofts it to straightish long-on
chest-high short ball on middle stump, Wade is slightly cramped for room but still times a pull off the back foot to the left of deep square leg
glances a slower cutter off the hips to fine leg
short and angling across off stump, deftly run down to third man
length ball on off, punched on the up to mid-off
chopped from off stump to third man
Bailey loses his shape as he slogs hard at this shortish ball on off stump and ends up dragging an inside edge to square leg
back of a length, outside off, nearly 140ks, Bailey moves outside the leg side, and swings it over backward point
short on off stump, 141ks, rushes Bailey into a hook. He sends a top edge over the keeper's head for six
full and bending in, Bailey nearly spoons a leading edge to mid-on. It drops short of the fielder running in
back of a length and outside off, Wade slashes and only collects fresh air
Wade jumps across for a scoop over fine leg but the ball moves further away from him. The line is so wide, he adjusts and slices it towards backward point in the end
tucked off the pads to deep midwicket

Bailey advances down the track and splices a catch to mid-off in the circle. He dares to step out, Bresnan drags his length back, looks like a short legcutter, hits high on the bat and balloons to Johnson
full and outside off, push-driven through the line to mid-off for a risky single. McDermott pulls out a full-length dive at the non-striker's end
slower bouncer, angling away, wide called for height
full and wide outside off, Wade throws his bat at the ball and sends an edge flying away past the diving keeper
back of a length and slanting down leg for a wide
back of a length, kicks up and moves past the outside edge as McDermott aims to run it down to third man
McDermott brings out the big dive again, chancing another risky single, Klinger picks up the ball at midwicket but can't throw the stumps down
Bresnan drops a catch to his right at deep third man but saves a boundary. Wade arches back and ramps a short ball finer than he intended. Bresnan stretches out but the ball does not stick
back of a length and bursts past the outside edge again
back of a length on off, 142ks, punched up to cover
full on the stumps, 140ks, another dot. Pushed back to the bowler from the crease
pitched up on middle, Wade languidly lifts it over the bowler's head
Wade shimmies to the leg side and down the track, Marsh spears it wide outside off
full and sliding into the pads, 139ks, Wade picks it up and whips it in the air to the left of deep square leg. Not middled, but Wade will take these
short and outside off, run down to third man
full on off, McDermott is excellent while hitting down the ground. He stretches out and punches it past the right of the bowler and left of mid-off
back of a length on middle, stabbed away to the right of mid-off
tucked off the hips to midwicket to round out a 16-run over
full on off, driven with the wrists to long-on
mid-off is in the circle, and McDermott launches this long, wide half-volley over that fielder. He stretches out and frees his arms
pitched up on off, driven to wide mid-off along the ground
short and on leg, swatted away to fine leg
full cutter outside off, 119ks, McDermott does not spot the change-up. Drags an inside edge past off stump
full and picked off a leg-stump line to deep square leg
wide of the crease, slower offbreak, 104ks, deftly steered to third man

Wade hooks and holes out to Kelly at deep square leg! Kelly runs to his right in the deep and tracks it down even as the sun squints into his eyes. Banged in short and angling away outside off, Bresnan does not offer much pace. Might have stuck in the surface, and the batsman can't manufacture enough pace of his own. Wade falls for 71 off 45 at a strike-rate of 158
short and outside off, glided to third man
full on the stumps, played back to the bowler
shuffles across and miscues a hook to square leg
dug short on off, rides the bounce and hooks to fine leg
very full on off, drilled to long-off off the front foot
chips a leading edge in front of cover and hares across to the other end
shortish cutter outside off, delays his punch to the off-side sweeeper
Christian muscles a s six over the bowler's head. He backs away outside leg, gets a slower ball on the leg stump and dismisses it with great authority
back of a length and outside off, gets on top of the bounce and punches through the covers
full-toss outside off, belted away to wide long-on
advances down the track and miscues a shorter ball over square leg
back of a length on off, punched up to Turner at backward point
Christian backs away and slices a full ball to the left of short cover
Christian backs away again, this time guides a single to deep point after being cramped for room
that's outta here! Huuuuuge six. Back of a length and outside off, McDermott clears his front leg and smites it into the stands beyond midwicket
full and wide outside off, throws his bat at the ball and nicks it past the right of the diving keeper. Marsh concedes 53 runs in four overs
shortish on off, Christian winds up and slugs it away past deep square leg for four
pinpoint yorker on middle, dug back to Bresnan
slower short ball on off stump, barely 110ks, Christian reads the change-up and swats it disdainfully over midwicket. Bam!
full-toss outside off, carved away to the left of deep point
slower bouncer, 106ks, bounces over the attempted hook, wide
Christian advances down the track, Bresnan pushes it full and wide outside off. He reaches out with his fast hands and slices it up and over extra cover, beats the man in the deep
back of a length cutter outside off, stabbed away to backward point
shortish and angling away outside off, Christian flays at it and only collects fresh air
Christian ventures outside leg, 144ks short ball, skids on leg and beats Christian

#Scenes in Perth! 140ks short ball from Johnson, skids off the pitch, and hits the helmet and detaches the back flap. Christian, though, is alert to the possibility of a single and races off to the other end. Johnson tracks down the ball and aims to kick it onto the stumps. Had he connected with the stumps, McDermott would have been out. Christian is good to continue
full and outside off, right in the swinging arc, stretches out and pumps it over the top of mid-off. The mid-off needs to slide back for Johnson. He is offering up room with his angle
just short of a good length and outside off, clears his front leg and smites it over the midwicket boundary. It's not a good day to be a Mitch
punched down the ground to long-on. Mitchell Marsh and Mitchell Johnson concede 96 runs in their 8 overs
McDermott brings up a 25-ball fifty. Richardson errs in length. Full and outside off, gets under it and smokes it over the wide long-on fence
off-stump yorker, dug back
ramped all the way for six. Shuffles across, uses the pace of the bowler, and scoops it over the keeper's head. Stunning
wide yorker, 142ks, past the reach of the batsman, past the tramline
full-toss outside off, 135ks, McDermott sizes it up and muscles it over the midwicket boundary - third six of the over
full and wide, nips away late, past the reach of the batsman. Wide.
wide yorker, jammed out through cover-point
wide yorker, nearly floors the batsman. Good finish from Richardson
near yorker on middle stump, the batsman backs away and carves a single through the covers to bring up the 200 for the Hurricanes
full-toss on middle, below the waistline, skids on, smoked past covers for four
DOT! Slower bouncer outside off, hoodwinks the swinging batsman
slower short ball on off stump, 113ks, backs away and muscles it over the covers for another boundary. He sat back, waiting for the slower ball

Christian backs a fair way outside the leg stump and misses a yorker. He ventures out of the crease and Bancroft catches him short with an accurate under-arm throw. Christian was looking for a single but it wasn't there. He did not have enough time to turn back and make his crease. Good work from the keeper
full-toss on middle stump, just below the waist, jammed out to deep midwicket
full and slanting away too wide outside off, off-side wide to start with
full on middle and leg, forward and bunted away past the right of mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Shaun Marsh slashes a cut to third man
overpitched and outside off, belted through the line but straight to Archer at mid-off
picked off the pads and nudged to the right of deep square leg
full, angling in, straightening to take the outside edge and roll away to short third man
lifter outside off, left alone
too full on off, squeezed to cover
short and angling in at the top of off stump, fended into the covers for one
full on off from over the wicket, jabbed to mid-off, a misfield from Bailey there allows a single
back of a length on middle, clipped to deep square leg
banged in short and outside off, Klinger takes it on and hooks a single over fine leg. Caught in the crowd
back-to-back boundaries for Klinger, and the sell-out crowd roars in approval. Overpitched and outside off, Klinger stays leg-side of the ball and pumps it through the covers
full and skidding into the pads, Marsh misses the flick and watches the ball dribble away square on the leg side
back of a length and angling into leg stump, pushed up to mid-on
back of a length and skidding in, inside-edged behind square on the leg side
back of a length and skidding back in to cramp the batsman for room, dropped in front of midwicket, Marsh searches for a single but is sent back by Klinger
Juggled catch at short fine leg by Reardon. Dug in short and outside off, Klinger gets inside the line but miscues a pull. Reardon takes it on the second bite after parrying it up
on a length and outside off, stabbed to Rose at point
pitched up on middle stump, Marsh holds his shape and hits it on the up firmly past the bowler
back of a length and zipping in to burst through the pull of Marsh. Extra pace from the bowler
good length and skidding in on middle, chopped to point
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to Wade at point. Paine is behind the stumps
full on off stump, forced to a diving Archer at mid-on
slightly back of a length and outside off, Marsh loads up and whacks it over the head of mid-on. Muscled to the boundary
begins with a well-directed bouncer on middle, forces the batsman to duck under it
short and skids in to ping the midriff/thigh
pace like fire! Short of a length and slants in from round the wicket, hits the body, as Marsh is late onto the hook
Marsh hangs back, clears the front leg, expects a short ball and banishes it to the midwicket boundary. Pulled away with authority
good length and angling down the leg side, Paine throws himself to his right to snag the ball
back of a length and outside off, guided to backward point. Marsh aims a single, slips, but Reardon can't throw the stumps down after swooping in on the ball
overpitched on middle at 144ks, Marsh sits back and blats it straight down the ground past the left of the bowler. Fetch that!

Bancroft slogs but can't clear the bigger boundary at deep square leg. Back of a length and outside off, Bancroft muscles it straight into the lap of  Milenko. He never really got going: out for 1 off 6 balls in a chase of 211
Marsh backs away outside leg, manufactures swinging room and crunnnnnnches a cover drive
back of a length on middle stump, 136ks, Marsh gives himself room again, this is punched on the up past extra cover's right
back of a length on leg stump, cramps the batsman for room, flapped in front of mid-on
dug in short and outside off, drags a pull to deep midwicket

Marsh has been bounced out by a 106ks slower ball. Back of a length on the leg stump, bounces up and cramps the batsman for room. He top-edges a pull to deep midwicket. Two wickets and two boundaries in the over
non-turner on middle from round the wicket, pushed back to the bowler
on a length and outside off, bunted to Archer at wide long-off
fuller and drifts in on middle, forward-defensive push to cover
Marsh backs away and punches a single to Archer at long-off
steps down the track and hits it to long-on
pushed through on middle, whipped to deep midwicket
full and angling down the leg for a wide. Christian has to re-bowl it

Archer throws himself forward from long leg and completes an excellent catch. Back of a length on the hips, Mitch Marsh picks it up and holes out with Archer pulling off another special catch. He's everywhere. What a poor game for Mitch Marsh. He conceded 53 runs in four overs and only managed 3 off 5 with the bat
back of a length and angling just outside leg, past the flick, another leg-side wide

Bailey nails a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Turner has to go for 2. This is all but over for the defending champs. Really full on off, Turner can't get underneath the length. Squeezes the ball to mid-off and sets off, but Bailey pulls off a stunning throw
short and rushes the batsman into a hook, gloved in the air but does not carry to Paine, the keeper, running in
very full and seams back in to beat the inside edge
back of a length and angling in, chopped into the ground to backward point
full and angling into the pads, tucked around the corner
leg-side wide
full on off stump, presses forward and drills it back to the bowler
rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and cuts to the right of deep third man
short and slanting into the hips, glanced away to fine leg
short, wide, scythed on the up over cover-point
full and outside off, presses forward and wafts a drive to mid-off
slower bouncer, too high, wide
Scorchers six down and sinking in Perth. Slower bouncer, on off stump, Voges skies a pull and Paine calmly settles under it
length ball, drifts in, pushed off the back foot to cover-point
full and spins away outside off, driven with the break through the covers
good length and angling in at middle, inside-edged to square leg for one
arm ball, arrows in and catches the pad but this is heading past leg stump
Rose yorks Cartwright with a 103kph fizzer. Speared in, squeezes underneath the bat, and rattles the stumps. This could end quickly for Perth Scorchers
slid through on off stump, defended off the front foot
full and angling in, clipped to mid-on. Bailey can't throw the stumps down this time
thuds into the gloves of the keeper. 145ks, hits the pitch, and zips past the outside edge
back of a length and just a shade outside off, 145ks, stabbed to mid-on off the inside half
bouncer down leg, wide. The pitch might have quickened up
full and wide outside off, 145ks, sliced out to sweeper cover
slower cutter but floated too wide outside off, past the tramline, off-side wide
shimmies out and drags a 145kph back of a length ball to long-on
full-toss on middle, jammed to mid-off
drifts in, and spins away outside off, skied in the air, Christian at long-off loses it under the lights
Richardson forays down the track, meets the pitch, and launches a six over the bowler's head
short and darted in, turned to the right of Rose
tossed up higher and turns away outside off, he steps out again, this is lifted cleanly over the covers
arm ball on leg stump, inside-edged onto the boot
tossed on middle, down the track and chipped over midwicket for a couple of runs
slower short ball outside off, carved away to the point boundary
back of a length, 144ks, Archer finds extra bounce and defeats the swinging batsman
full-toss on off, spliced to sweeper cover
veering into the pads, 146ks, picked up and sent over short fine leg for four
pitched up and outside off, 147ks, swings hard and sends an outside edge flying past the right of a diving Paine
back of a length, kicks up and hits the splice
Richardson backs away outside leg, Christian chases him, jammed to the covers for one
bouncer on off stump, sails over the hook, one for the over
The bat flies out of Bresnan's hands. Back of a length on off, he swings so hard that he loses his bat. The ball only goes as far as long-on
back of a length and outside off, skids off the pitch and rushes the batsman into a shot. He slashes and nicks it behind to Paine. This pitch has surely quickened up
back of a length and nips through the channel, beats the outside edge
Kelly ventures outside leg and tickles an inside edge to square leg
full on the stumps, stretches out and drills a single to long-on
slower ball, this hip-high ball is swatted off the back foot to Wade at deep square leg
another slower ball, just a shade outside off, slugged to wide long-on
back of a length and outside off, smeared away to sweeper cover
short on off, swings a pull off the back foot to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, Kelly swings at the ball with all his might and flat-bats the ball up and over extra cover
back of a length and angling in, shuffles across and gloves it behind to the keeper
backs away outside leg and misses a lifter outside off
Kelly tries to give himself room but Christian follows him with a short ball aimed at the head. He top-edges a hook to deep square leg. Scorchers are in danger of being bowled out
tickled away to Archer at short fine leg
back of a length on off stump, backs away and swishes it over the bowler's head
shuffles across and shovels a pull to the fine-leg boundary. Bresnan is having some fun with the bat
back of a length and outside off, opens the face and glides the ball to square-ish third man
short on off, rocks back and swats a pull to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, Johnson shimmies away and flat-bats it down to long-on
Bresnan moves away outside leg, the bowler chases him with a short ball. Top-edged over Reardon at long leg
back of a length and outside off, 118ks, this slower ball is clouted to deep midwicket. Lands in front of an on-rushing Christian
Archer runs to right from long-on and catches it. Pause the celebration, Archer! It's a no-ball - over the waist. Full-toss outside off, muscled in the air
short on middle stump, slogged away to deep midwicket
bouncer on middle, 136ks, Johnson gives himself room. Swings and only collects fresh air
short and zipping away outside off, Johnson can't hook it away again
back of a length and outside off, flat-batted to long-off
Bresnan backs away outside leg and top-edges a hook in front of deep square. He hares across for the second, pulls out a full-length dive, and makes his crease

Dan Christian wraps up Hobart Hurricanes' win and makes another tournament final. We will have a new champion this season. Dipping slower cutter, Bresnan gets a taste of his own medicine. He does not spot the change-up, plays across the line, and is trapped in front
